abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews performance by polka band Jimmy Sturr and His Orchestra at Brooklyn Bowl.
snippet: Jimmy Sturr brought his band and his four-plus decades of experience as a leading polka star to Brooklyn Bowl.
lead_paragraph: Jimmy Sturr brought his band and his four-plus decades of experience as a leading polka star to Brooklyn Bowl.

headline.main: Giving ‘Sweet Home Alabama’ a Polish Accent
headline.print_headline: Giving ‘Sweet Home Alabama’ a Polish Accent
headline.seo: Jimmy Sturr and His Orchestra at Brooklyn Bowl - Review
